name: Mushroom, Leek, Chicken Sausage and Tortellini Soup
author: Jane Lightle
summary: Enjoy this hearty soup made with plenty of great ingredients and lots of taste!
ingredients: 2 large leeks, cleaned, and cut into 1/4 inch thick rounds
3 tablespoons hot pepper sauce (e.g. Tabasco™), or to taste
5 sprigs chopped fresh cilantro, for garnish
directions: Place the olive oil in a skillet, and heat over medium-high heat
Stir in the mushrooms and leeks; cook and stir until they soften, about 5 minutes
Meanwhile, pour the chicken broth into a large pan, and bring to a boil over medium-high heat
Add the sausage, tortellini, garlic, and hot sauce
Reduce heat to medium, and stir in the mushrooms and leeks
Cover, and simmer soup mixture for 30 minutes
